title: Civil Police Commissioner's Office of Funchal
original_title: Comissariado de Policia Civil do Funchal
body:
It was established on September 1, 1878. The first police commissioner was Pedro de Alcantara Góis, appointed in 1877, but who had been in office as the director of the police in Funchal since August 3, 1864.

See Police.

1 de Setembro de 1878: Establishment of the Civil Police Commissioner's Office of Funchal
1877: Appointment of Pedro de Alcantara Góis as police commissioner
3 de Agôsto de 1864: Start of Pedro de Alcantara Góis' tenure as director of the police in Funchal
